sql-statements.sql-statement: SELECT INCORPORATION_NUMBER as incorporation_number FROM CORPORATE_BODY WHERE ACTION_CODE_TYPE_ID = 9000 AND TRADING_STATUS_TYPE_ID = 3 AND ACTION_CODE_DATE >= TO_DATE ('30-DEC-2009','DD-MON-YYYY')

SELECT DISTINCT INCORPORATION_NUMBER as incorporation_number FROM CORPORATE_BODY CB WHERE CB.ACTION_CODE_TYPE_ID IN (7001, 7002, 7101, 7401, 7402, 7403) OR (ACTION_CODE_TYPE_ID = 7701 AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INSOLVENCY_CASE IC WHERE CB.CORPORATE_BODY_ID = IC.CORPORATE_BODY_ID AND INSOLVENCY_CASE_END_DATE > SYSDATE AND INSOLVENCY_CASE_TYPE_ID IN (1, 2, 3))) ORDER BY INCORPORATION_NUMBER ASC
